items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.
items.title: Kimforee/FeryAPI: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.
items.title: anandku06/CodeGPT: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.

items.content_html: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.

items.content_html: lightweight browser extension that provides a real-time countdown to the end of the year, showing the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Stay on top of time as the year progresses with this simple yet effective tool.
